name: Block theft auto
description:
This game is 10% done

Controls:

P: escape menu/enable picking up items with E"they have to have physics"
Escape: escape
WASD: movement
F: interact
Mouse: Do mouse things
Arrow up: Brings up phone

Description!!

You play as, Coffey... a stranger that recently moved into hyrax village

You are kinda lost at first, but as you cruse around in your electric supercar with no wind speed simulation you come across npc's around the world that you gotta help out

You got a phone handy to change things... message your buddies, check social media and check out what time it is

You got access to a couple of cars, and a pretty wide area to explore

So why not grab some coffee, maybe a snack and check out block theft auto

I had to hurry up development since i wanted to make this game playable

It now features a graphics menu

Runs in DX11

Is made in Unreal engine 5

This has truly been a challange

Doing the questlog was proberly the most challanging aspect of it all

Then comming up with quests was another challange, but their is 3 at the current state

If this game peaks any interests, i will add more of cause and update the game

But the sole purpose of this game is to show off what i can do in the Devtober game jam

I did a prejam game also featured in the jam that you hopefully will check out as well

i had to rush to the big city to upload it since my private internet connection is absolute garbage

MAAANY!! obsticles occurred that i had to solve, if you have developed games yourself, you know when you add multible interfaces and stuff, they tend to screw up somewhat down the line

i have mainly done bugfixing ect the last week and added a small minigame you GOTTA try out!

Download and join the crew in hyrax village
